inline-event-handler.suggestion: Move inline event handlers into external JS and use addEventListener().
references: OWASP XSS Prevention Cheat Sheet: Avoid inline event handlers

javascript-uri.suggestion: Avoid `javascript:` URLs. Use event listeners or proper link URLs instead.
references: OWASP XSS Prevention Cheat Sheet: Don’t use javascript: URIs

inline-script.suggestion: Move inline `<script>` contents into external files and enforce a strong CSP.
references: OWASP XSS Prevention Cheat Sheet: Don’t place untrusted HTML into `<script>`

css-javascript.suggestion: Remove `javascript:` from CSS. Use safe CSS or external style sheets.
references: DOMPurify Issue #—CSS javascript bypass (e.g. mXSS via `style` attribute)

iframe-srcdoc.suggestion: Avoid unsanitized `srcdoc`. Use a sandboxed iframe or external HTML file with proper sanitization.
references: DOMPurify GitHub Release Notes: srcdoc bypass considerations
